TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Pin-ni-si-lin, title = Pin-ni-si-lin, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pin-ni-si-lin} }

S.FORM: = pin-ni-si-lin 盤尼西林 / cin-mey-su 青黴素 = 928 a mihcaan ci Bow-lay-min i Lon-tun talakaway a cacudadan musakamu tu bayking, itayaw ci Bow-lay-min misulit tu sakay cacay pakayniay badisusu'cilcay pisuzikuz misulit tu nigingkiwan, i pitanengan yadah ku nipahabay tu kim kulitana badisusu'cilkay "S. aureus", 7 a bulad tu zikuz mey-cin tabu mahetik tini pipahabayan, 8 a bulan ci Bow-la-min a tademawan i inak misalihalay mihibang, 9 a bulad panukas taluma' pitanengan. mahini ci Bow-lay-min maazih niza silangaw matumes nu bayking ku pipahabayan i kalimucu' sicin-mey-cin, liwliw nayi' ku mulangaway nu bayking, ci Bow-lay-min kasenun mazateng ku mey-cin taneng a mipatay tu bayking, kuyni mahiniay musakamu i 1929 a mihcaan nu Ing-kow pitanengan patahkal tu migingkiway tu imelang. zikuz yadah ku nisanga'an niza aca tu malecaday nitanengan, kilul malikeluh tu bunday, hicaen misanga' ku mahiniay pan-ni-si-lin, cangu'ut kuyni a gizice, acaay kalalid sa miazih migingkiw, kilul katahkal nu hwang-an a sapayu,, tademaw amin sakay cn-mey-su anipakatineng caay kanamuh. 1935 a mihcaan Ing-kow niw-cin talakaway cacudadan migingkiway tu imelang ci-zen ci Bow-low-li atu miliwkuay i Ing-koway Te-kow migingkiway ci Cyen-en makakadum, migingkiw tu kapahay a cin-mey-su, malaliyas atu macacayatay a hwa-sey, palasawad tu cin-meysu pisanga' a bunday. zikuz saayaway ni Bow-low-li a migikiway a sakaput makay cin-mey-cinan miala patahkal tu kang-sen-su-pan-ni-si-lin "singangan aca tu cin-mey-su", Niw-cin migingkiway cu-zen ci Ha-li-s "Henry Harris" namusakamu, "inayi' ci Bow-lay-min, caay ka izaw ci Cyen-en, nayi' ci Cyen-en, cayay ka izaw ci Bow-low-li, inayi' ci Bow-loe-li, cayay ka izaw ci Si-te-li, inayi' ci Si-te-lix, ainayi' ku pan-ni-si-lin." 1941 a mihcaan saayaway a tademaw mikinsaay tu cin-mey-su, maazih ku cin-mey-su, hamin masumad tu ku tademaw atu milaliday a imelangan malalebu tu patay a likisi, palalecad tu nikauzip nu tademaw amanayatu, namahiza ci Bow-lay-min ci Cyen-en atu ci Bow-loe-li mapulung pakalal tu 1945 a mihcaan tu Now-pey-al-i-sye a kawlah.

= pin-ni-si-lin 盤尼西林 / cin-mey-so 青黴素 = 928 a mihcaan ci Bow-lay-min i Lon-ton talakaway a cacodadan mosakamo to bayking, itayaw ci Bow-lay-min misolit to sakay cacay pakayniay badisoso'cilcay pisozikoz misolit to nigingkiwan, i pitanengan yadah ko nipahabay to kim kolitana badisoso'cilkay "S. aoreos", 7 a bolad to zikoz mey-cin tabo mahetik tini pipahabayan, 8 a bolan ci Bow-la-min a tademawan i inak misalihalay mihibang, 9 a bolad panokas taloma' pitanengan. mahini ci Bow-lay-min maazih niza silangaw matomes no bayking ko pipahabayan i kalimoco' sicin-mey-cin, liwliw nayi' ko molangaway no bayking, ci Bow-lay-min kasenon mazateng ko mey-cin taneng a mipatay to bayking, koyni mahiniay mosakamo i 1929 a mihcaan no Ing-kow pitanengan patahkal to migingkiway to imelang. zikoz yadah ko nisanga'an niza aca to malecaday nitanengan, kilol malikeloh to bonday, hicaen misanga' ko mahiniay pan-ni-si-lin, cango'ot koyni a gizice, acaay kalalid sa miazih migingkiw, kilol katahkal no hwang-an a sapayo,, tademaw amin sakay cn-mey-so anipakatineng caay kanamoh. 1935 a mihcaan Ing-kow niw-cin talakaway cacodadan migingkiway to imelang ci-zen ci Bow-low-li ato miliwkoay i Ing-koway Te-kow migingkiway ci Cyen-en makakadom, migingkiw to kapahay a cin-mey-so, malaliyas ato macacayatay a hwa-sey, palasawad to cin-meyso pisanga' a bonday. zikoz saayaway ni Bow-low-li a migikiway a sakapot makay cin-mey-cinan miala patahkal to kang-sen-so-pan-ni-si-lin "singangan aca to cin-mey-so", Niw-cin migingkiway co-zen ci Ha-li-s "Henry Harris" namosakamo, "inayi' ci Bow-lay-min, caay ka izaw ci Cyen-en, nayi' ci Cyen-en, cayay ka izaw ci Bow-low-li, inayi' ci Bow-loe-li, cayay ka izaw ci Si-te-li, inayi' ci Si-te-lix, ainayi' ko pan-ni-si-lin." 1941 a mihcaan saayaway a tademaw mikinsaay to cin-mey-so, maazih ko cin-mey-so, hamin masomad to ko tademaw ato milaliday a imelangan malalebo to patay a likisi, palalecad to nikaozip no tademaw amanayato, namahiza ci Bow-lay-min ci Cyen-en ato ci Bow-loe-li mapolong pakalal to 1945 a mihcaan to Now-pey-al-i-sye a kawlah.
